name: Erotica Robotica (nsalaway)
description:
Erotica Robotica is a Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes style game where multiple players must work together to sexually pleasure a robot. One player will be manning the computer, attempting to please the robot by solving puzzles. The other player(s) must help read the robot's manual to decipher exactly what it wants. Can you satisfy SAM?

Download the manual at:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/hoq84tlssurzg8d/EroticaRoboticaManual.pdf?dl=0
